description: The file defines a React component for an Analytics page, fetching data via react-query, and rendering various charts (line, pie, bar) using recharts library, along with some KPI metrics. It includes a helper component for metric display.

methods.name: AnalyticsPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering analytics charts and KPIs.

methods.name: MetricCard
methods.description: Reusable component to display a metric label and value.
